verses.name: Psalms 50:1
verses.text: The mighty God, even the Lord, hath spoken, and called the earth from the rising of the sun unto the going down thereof.

verses.name: Psalms 50:2
verses.text: Out of Zion, the perfection of beauty, God hath shined.

verses.name: Psalms 50:3
verses.text: Our God shall come, and shall not keep silence: a fire shall devour before him, and it shall be very tempestuous round about him.

verses.name: Psalms 50:4
verses.text: He shall call to the heavens from above, and to the earth, that he may judge his people.

verses.name: Psalms 50:5
verses.text: Gather my saints together unto me; those that have made a covenant with me by sacrifice.
